meanings.definition: Bricks that are red in color.
meanings.sent1: The house had a beautiful exterior with redbricks walls.
meanings.sent2: The redbricks pathway led to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The redbricks fireplace added a cozy touch to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks turned as red as redbricks when she blushed.
meanings.sent5: The setting sun painted the sky in redbricks hues.

meanings.definition: A building material made of red clay.
meanings.sent1: The old house was constructed using redbricks.
meanings.sent2: The factory produced redbricks for construction projects.
meanings.sent3: The children built a small fort out of redbricks in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was dotted with tall buildings made of redbricks.
meanings.sent5: The artist used redbricks to create a unique sculpture.

meanings.definition: To construct or pave with red bricks.
meanings.sent1: The workers will redbricks the patio tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: They decided to redbricks the entire driveway.
meanings.sent3: He wanted to surprise his wife by redbricksing the garden path.
